events.message: The claimant reported a car accident that occurred on 2024-04-29 involving a rear-end collision at a stoplight intersection.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and relevant keywords indicating a vehicle collision.
Agent Michael Thompson was assigned to handle this auto accident claim and to initiate contact with the claimant for further details.
Acknowledgement of the claim was sent to the customer, confirming that their vehicle accident report is under review by the insurance company.
Requested the claimant to submit police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates to proceed with claim investigation.
The claimant uploaded all required documents, including accident photos, police report, and an official repair quote from a certified mechanic.
The investigation team began the review of the submitted evidence to assess the coverage and liability aspects of the collision event.
Investigation was completed confirming that the other party was at fault and the claimant’s vehicle damage is covered fully under policy terms.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the full repair costs and rental car reimbursement as per the policy agreement.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the clarity and timeliness of the settlement proposal and appreciated the agent’s support.
The insurance claim was officially approved after the claimant accepted the proposed settlement for vehicle repairs.
Payment for the agreed settlement amount was issued directly to the claimant’s repair service provider to expedite vehicle repairs.
The claim was closed after confirmation that the vehicle repairs were completed to the claimant’s satisfaction and all payments processed.
All documents and electronic records related to this auto accident claim were securely archived for future reference and compliance.
